title: Frameworks: Patterns of Action
description: Decision-making frameworks and strategic patterns that guide human and AI collaboration across different technological eras.

clusters.title: Decision Loops
clusters.description: Cyclical frameworks for rapid decision-making in complex environments

exemplars.name: OODA Loop

eraMapping.onPrem: Military command structures with paper-based intelligence gathering
eraMapping.cloudNative: Real-time data dashboards and collaborative decision platforms
eraMapping.genAI: AI-assisted pattern recognition and scenario generation
eraMapping.agenticAI: Autonomous agents executing OODA cycles in milliseconds
eraMapping.bci: Direct neural feedback loops bypassing conscious deliberation

caseStudies: US Air Force fighter pilot training programs

clusters.title: Complexity Navigation
clusters.description: Frameworks for understanding and operating in complex adaptive systems

eraMapping.onPrem: Manual categorization of business problems into domains
eraMapping.cloudNative: Dynamic system monitoring and automated escalation paths
eraMapping.genAI: AI classification of problems with contextual recommendations
eraMapping.agenticAI: Autonomous domain switching and response orchestration
eraMapping.bci: Intuitive pattern recognition enhanced by direct neural interfaces

references: Boyd, J. (1987). A Discourse on Winning and Losing
Snowden, D. & Boone, M. (2007). A Leader's Framework for Decision Making. Harvard Business Review
Kurtz, C.F. & Snowden, D.J. (2003). The new dynamics of strategy: Sense-making in a complex and complicated world
